name: Heart of Snow
description:
Two years ago, on the night of the winter moon, tragedy befell Titania when those human mages attacked and burnt her village to the ground. In the chaos and desperation her mother... did not survive the night. That set the stage for her quest for revenge, this snow leopard's sight set on the one ultimately responsible for her mother's murder: Khanda Oscuro. 

She would have his head... or die trying

At least that was the case until this annoying little urchin, Lumi, dropped right into her life. It was "Let's do this" and "Let's steal that." A little ball of sunshine that never seemed to shut.up. Such was the life of an aggrieved snow leopard journeying across Zaminius with a 10-year-old in tow.

Will his sunlight be able to melt her heart of snow? Will she let him? You choose: Revenge or Family.


  • Demo Features
    • 4900+ words
    • 6 backgrounds
    • 2 special event CGs
    • Titania's Journal to explain terms and universe lore

Format: (Mostly) Kinetic Novel - One choice & Two Endings

Genre: Fantasy, Medieval, Action, Adventure, NO Romance Options

Length: ~75k words

Language: English

Platform: PC (Windows, Mac, Linux)

Playtime: 5-8 hours

Assets: 30+ Backgrounds & 30+ Special Event CGs, Original Soundtrack, Titania's Journal

Content warnings: depictions of blood, disturbing imagery, violence, mild language

This game is a team effort with many people helping to make this project possible. Below are the four principal developers. To everyone else not listed here, I love you all thank you for your support. Teamwork makes the dream work!

Noor Fernandez aka gamer_logic (Reddit)

32, Brazilian-American

I'm the writer/programmer/marketer/SFX Artist/game design lead for Heart of Snow. I am a 32-year-old Brazilian American trying her hand at creating a visual novel. The biggest inspiration for our game is Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn meets Seirei no Moribito (A mother-son anime.) The best part of making this game is writing it because I love getting lost in fantastic pseudo-medieval worlds and I hope you will too!

Andrew Hendrickson aka Spud Dastardly (Portfolio)

31, American

Hi,

My name is Andrew. I am a 31-year-old American mathematician who writes video game music for fun. This is my first video game project and I am very excited to have my music featured.

Kashi Oliver (Portfolio , FA)

26, Brazilian

Hi, my name is Kashi and I've been obsessed with art since I was seven years old. Every kind of art you can think of like music, movies, games, theater and, my favorite (of course) illustrations. My interest in art began at seven and I've been studying it more formally only after I was 20.

Luciana aka Luha (Portfolio , Instagram)

27, Brazilian

Hello, my name is Luciana or Luha, the nickname that I am most well known for on the interwebs. I'm 27 years old Brazilian and a freelance illustrator for the last three years. I've loved drawing since childhood watching cartoons on the TV and trying to recreate comic book characters I read while at the dentist. My love and appreciation for games is very important in my life for introducing me to wonderful, dazzling worlds I, as a rural gal, could never otherwise experience. Their fantastical settings, backdrops, moving music, and emotional stories inspired my little past "me" to chase after a chance to create a story one of those stories. Through my art, I want to bring it to life.
